remarks: Lemma for ~ ivth .  The set ` S ` of all ` x ` values with ` ( F `` x ) ` less than ` U ` is lower bounded by ` A ` and upper bounded by ` B ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jun-2014.)
statement:
ivth.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
ivth.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
ivth.3 $e |- ( ph -> U e. RR ) $.
ivth.4 $e |- ( ph -> A < B ) $.
ivth.5 $e |- ( ph -> ( A [,] B ) C_ D ) $.
ivth.7 $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( D -cn-> CC ) ) $.
ivth.8 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ( A [,] B ) ) -> ( F ` x ) e. RR ) $.
ivth.9 $e |- ( ph -> ( ( F ` A ) < U /\ U < ( F ` B ) ) ) $.
ivth.10 $e |- S = { x e. ( A [,] B ) | ( F ` x ) <_ U } $.
ivthlem1 $p |- ( ph -> ( A e. S /\ A. z e. S z <_ B ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x z $.
$d D x z $.
